public abstract class EnvironmentUtil

Utility class that provides shortcuts for accessing some Environment entries.

injectEnvironmentEntries

public static void injectEnvironmentEntries(Environment env,
                                            Object object)
Injects appropriate environment entries to the fields of given object, if the field has annotation EnvironmentEntry. The annotation can provide the environment entry key or the type of the field will be used. If the annotation declares that the dependency is mandatory and the entry is not found, an exception will be thrown.

The parameters to this method must not be null!

Parameters:
env - The environment to use for entries lookup.
object - The object that may contain fields with the EnvironmentEntry annotation.
Since:
2.0
